satellites.name: CHIRPS Daily
satellites.description: Climate Hazards Center InfraRed Precipitation with Station data (CHIRPS) is a 30+ year quasi-global rainfall dataset.

satellites.name: MODIS MOD13Q1 v6.1 (16-Day)
satellites.description: The MOD13Q1 V6.1 product provides a Vegetation Index (VI) value at a per pixel basis, including NDVI and EVI, computed from atmospherically corrected bi-directional surface reflectances.

satellites.name: ERA5-Land Daily Aggregated
satellites.description: ERA5-Land is a reanalysis dataset providing a consistent view of the evolution of land variables over several decades at an enhanced resolution compared to ERA5. This dataset includes daily aggregates with 50 variables covering temperature, soil moisture, snow, lake properties, radiation, heat fluxes, evaporation, runoff, wind, and precipitation. Flow bands are aggregated as daily sums while non-flow bands are daily averages.

bands.name: dewpoint_temperature_2m
bands.description: Daily average temperature to which the air at 2 meters above the surface would have to be cooled for saturation to occur. Measure of humidity.

bands.name: temperature_2m
bands.description: Daily average temperature of air at 2m above the surface of land, sea or in-land waters.

bands.name: skin_temperature
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the surface of the Earth. Represents the temperature of the uppermost surface layer.

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_1
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the soil in layer 1 (0 - 7 cm).

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_2
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the soil in layer 2 (7-28 cm).

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_3
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the soil in layer 3 (28-100 cm).

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_4
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the soil in layer 4 (100-289 cm).

bands.name: lake_bottom_temperature
bands.description: Daily average temperature of water at the bottom of inland water bodies (lakes, reservoirs, rivers) and coastal waters.

bands.name: lake_ice_depth
bands.description: Daily average thickness of ice on inland water bodies (lakes, reservoirs and rivers) and coastal waters.

bands.name: lake_ice_temperature
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the uppermost surface of ice on inland water bodies and coastal waters.

bands.name: lake_mix_layer_depth
bands.description: Daily average thickness of the upper most layer of an inland water body that is well mixed.

bands.name: lake_mix_layer_temperature
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the upper most layer of inland water bodies that is well mixed.

bands.name: lake_shape_factor
bands.description: Daily average parameter describing how temperature changes with depth in the thermocline layer of inland water bodies.

bands.name: lake_total_layer_temperature
bands.description: Daily average mean temperature of total water column in inland water bodies and coastal waters.

bands.name: snow_albedo
bands.description: Daily average fraction of solar radiation reflected by the snow. Values vary between 0 and 1.

bands.name: snow_cover
bands.description: Daily average fraction (0-1) of the cell occupied by snow.

bands.name: snow_density
bands.description: Daily average mass of snow per cubic meter in the snow layer.

bands.name: snow_depth
bands.description: Daily average snow thickness on the ground (excluding snow on canopy).

bands.name: snow_depth_water_equivalent
bands.description: Daily average depth of snow from the snow-covered area of a grid box, in meters of water equivalent.

bands.name: snowfall_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of total snow that has fallen to the Earth's surface.

bands.name: snowmelt_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of melting of snow averaged over the grid box.

bands.name: temperature_of_snow_layer
bands.description: Daily average temperature of the snow layer from the ground to the snow-air interface.

bands.name: skin_reservoir_content
bands.description: Daily average amount of water in the vegetation canopy and/or in a thin layer on the soil.

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_1
bands.description: Daily average volume of water in soil layer 1 (0 - 7 cm).

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_2
bands.description: Daily average volume of water in soil layer 2 (7-28 cm).

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_3
bands.description: Daily average volume of water in soil layer 3 (28-100 cm).

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_4
bands.description: Daily average volume of water in soil layer 4 (100-289 cm).

bands.name: forecast_albedo
bands.description: Daily average measure of the reflectivity of the Earth's surface. Values are between 0 and 1.

bands.name: surface_latent_heat_flux_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of exchange of latent heat with the surface through turbulent diffusion.

bands.name: surface_net_solar_radiation_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of solar radiation reaching the surface minus the amount reflected by the Earth's surface.

bands.name: surface_net_thermal_radiation_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of net thermal radiation at the surface.

bands.name: surface_sensible_heat_flux_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of transfer of heat between the Earth's surface and the atmosphere through turbulent air motion.

bands.name: surface_solar_radiation_downwards_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of solar radiation reaching the surface of the Earth, including both direct and diffuse radiation.

bands.name: surface_thermal_radiation_downwards_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of thermal radiation emitted by the atmosphere and clouds that reaches the Earth's surface.

bands.name: evaporation_from_bare_soil_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of evaporation from bare soil. WARNING: Due to known ECMWF data issue, this band has swapped values with evaporation_from_vegetation_transpiration.

bands.name: evaporation_from_open_water_surfaces_excluding_oceans_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of evaporation from surface water storage like lakes. WARNING: Due to known ECMWF data issue, this band has swapped values with evaporation_from_bare_soil.

bands.name: evaporation_from_the_top_of_canopy_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of evaporation from the canopy interception reservoir at the top of the canopy.

bands.name: evaporation_from_vegetation_transpiration_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of evaporation from vegetation transpiration. WARNING: Due to known ECMWF data issue, this band has swapped values with evaporation_from_open_water_surfaces_excluding_oceans.

bands.name: potential_evaporation_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of potential evaporation computed for agricultural land as if it is well watered.

bands.name: runoff_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of total runoff (surface + sub-surface). Total amount of water accumulated.

bands.name: snow_evaporation_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of evaporation from snow averaged over the grid box.

bands.name: sub_surface_runoff_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of water that drains away under the ground.

bands.name: surface_runoff_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of water that drains away over the surface.

bands.name: total_evaporation_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of water that has evaporated from the Earth's surface into vapor in the air above.

bands.name: u_component_of_wind_10m
bands.description: Daily average eastward component of the 10m wind. Horizontal speed of air moving towards the east.

bands.name: v_component_of_wind_10m
bands.description: Daily average northward component of the 10m wind. Horizontal speed of air moving towards the north.

bands.name: surface_pressure
bands.description: Daily average pressure of the atmosphere on the surface of land, sea and in-land water.

bands.name: total_precipitation_sum
bands.description: Daily sum of liquid and frozen water, including rain and snow, that falls to the Earth's surface.

bands.name: leaf_area_index_high_vegetation
bands.description: Daily average one-half of the total green leaf area per unit horizontal ground surface area for high vegetation type.

bands.name: leaf_area_index_low_vegetation
bands.description: Daily average one-half of the total green leaf area per unit horizontal ground surface area for low vegetation type.

satellites.name: ERA5-Land Hourly
satellites.description: ERA5-Land is a reanalysis dataset providing a consistent view of the evolution of land variables over several decades at an enhanced resolution compared to ERA5.

bands.name: dewpoint_temperature_2m
bands.description: Temperature to which the air, at 2 meters above the surface of the Earth, would have to be cooled for saturation to occur. It is a measure of the humidity of the air.

bands.name: temperature_2m
bands.description: Temperature of air at 2m above the surface of land, sea or in-land waters.

bands.name: skin_temperature
bands.description: Temperature of the surface of the Earth. It represents the temperature of the uppermost surface layer, which has no heat capacity and so can respond instantaneously to changes in surface fluxes.

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_1
bands.description: Temperature of the soil in layer 1 (0 - 7 cm).

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_2
bands.description: Temperature of the soil in layer 2 (7-28 cm).

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_3
bands.description: Temperature of the soil in layer 3 (28-100 cm).

bands.name: soil_temperature_level_4
bands.description: Temperature of the soil in layer 4 (100-289 cm).

bands.name: lake_bottom_temperature
bands.description: Temperature of water at the bottom of inland water bodies (lakes, reservoirs, rivers) and coastal waters.

bands.name: lake_ice_depth
bands.description: The thickness of ice on inland water bodies (lakes, reservoirs and rivers) and coastal waters.

bands.name: lake_ice_temperature
bands.description: The temperature of the uppermost surface of ice on inland water bodies (lakes, reservoirs, rivers) and coastal waters.

bands.name: lake_mix_layer_depth
bands.description: The thickness of the upper most layer of an inland water body that is well mixed and has a near constant temperature with depth.

bands.name: lake_mix_layer_temperature
bands.description: The temperature of the upper most layer of inland water bodies (lakes, reservoirs and rivers) or coastal waters) that is well mixed.

bands.name: lake_shape_factor
bands.description: Describes the way that temperature changes with depth in the thermocline layer of inland water bodies.

bands.name: lake_total_layer_temperature
bands.description: The mean temperature of total water column in inland water bodies (lakes, reservoirs and rivers) and coastal waters.

bands.name: snow_albedo
bands.description: Fraction of solar (shortwave) radiation reflected by the snow, for both direct and diffuse radiation. Values vary between 0 and 1.

bands.name: snow_cover
bands.description: Represents the fraction (0-1) of the cell / grid-box occupied by snow.

bands.name: snow_density
bands.description: Mass of snow per cubic meter in the snow layer.

bands.name: snow_depth
bands.description: Instantaneous grid-box average of the snow thickness on the ground (excluding snow on canopy).

bands.name: snow_depth_water_equivalent
bands.description: Depth of snow from the snow-covered area of a grid box, in meters of water equivalent.

bands.name: snowfall
bands.description: Accumulated total snow that has fallen to the Earth's surface.

bands.name: snowmelt
bands.description: Melting of snow averaged over the grid box.

bands.name: temperature_of_snow_layer
bands.description: Gives the temperature of the snow layer from the ground to the snow-air interface.

bands.name: skin_reservoir_content
bands.description: Amount of water in the vegetation canopy and/or in a thin layer on the soil.

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_1
bands.description: Volume of water in soil layer 1 (0 - 7 cm).

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_2
bands.description: Volume of water in soil layer 2 (7 -28 cm).

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_3
bands.description: Volume of water in soil layer 3 (28 - 100 cm).

bands.name: volumetric_soil_water_layer_4
bands.description: Volume of water in soil layer 4 (100 - 289 cm).

bands.name: surface_latent_heat_flux
bands.description: Amount of energy going from the surface to the air through evaporation, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: surface_net_solar_radiation
bands.description: Amount of solar radiation (shortwave) reaching the surface of the Earth (both direct and diffuse) minus the amount reflected by the Earth's surface, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: surface_net_thermal_radiation
bands.description: Amount of thermal radiation (longwave) emitted from the Earth's surface minus the amount of thermal radiation emitted by the atmosphere and absorbed by the surface, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: surface_sensible_heat_flux
bands.description: Transfer of heat between the Earth's surface and the atmosphere through the effects of turbulent air motion, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: surface_solar_radiation_downwards
bands.description: Amount of solar radiation (shortwave) reaching the surface of the Earth (both direct and diffuse), integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: surface_thermal_radiation_downwards
bands.description: Amount of thermal radiation (longwave) emitted by the atmosphere and absorbed by the Earth's surface, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: evaporation_from_bare_soil
bands.description: Amount of evaporation from bare soil at the top of the land surface, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: evaporation_from_open_water_surfaces_excluding_oceans
bands.description: Amount of evaporation from open water surfaces (lakes, reservoirs, rivers, wetlands), integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: evaporation_from_the_top_of_canopy
bands.description: Amount of evaporation from the canopy interception reservoir, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: evaporation_from_vegetation_transpiration
bands.description: Amount of evapotranspiration from vegetation, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: potential_evaporation
bands.description: Amount of evaporation that would occur from a vegetation canopy for the given atmospheric conditions, assuming ideal conditions, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: runoff
bands.description: Amount of water accumulated at the surface that exceeds the infiltration capacity of the soil and does not evaporate (includes both surface and sub-surface runoff), integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: snow_evaporation
bands.description: Amount of evaporation from the snow surface, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: sub_surface_runoff
bands.description: Amount of water draining through the soil and accumulating at the base of the soil column, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: surface_runoff
bands.description: Amount of water accumulated at the surface that exceeds the infiltration capacity of the soil and does not evaporate, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: total_evaporation
bands.description: Amount of evaporation and transpiration from the Earth's surface and vegetation, integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: u_component_of_wind_10m
bands.description: Eastward component of the 10m wind. It is the horizontal speed of air moving towards the east.

bands.name: v_component_of_wind_10m
bands.description: Northward component of the 10m wind. It is the horizontal speed of air moving towards the north.

bands.name: surface_pressure
bands.description: Pressure (force per unit area) of the atmosphere on the surface of land, sea and in-land water. It is a measure of the weight of all the air in a column vertically above the point of measurement.

bands.name: total_precipitation
bands.description: Total precipitation (rain and snow) integrated over the period specified.

bands.name: leaf_area_index_high_vegetation
bands.description: One half of the total green leaf area per unit horizontal ground surface area for high vegetation type.

bands.name: leaf_area_index_low_vegetation
bands.description: One half of the total green leaf area per unit horizontal ground surface area for low vegetation type.

masks.name: ESA WorldCereal 10m v100
masks.description: A global-scale annual and seasonal crop map product suite. The collection contains up to 106 agro-ecological zone (AEZ) images for each product which were all processed with respect to their own regional seasonality.
